name: Galaxy Forces
description:
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

JOYSTICK IS STRICTLY NEEDED TO PLAY THIS GAME.

IF YOU ARE USING YOUR KEYBOARD, YOU WILL NOT

BE ABLE TO BOOST OR BREAK.

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Galaxy Forces is a game on the on-rails genre, made using MixandJam's project as a framework.

The game currently only has the tutorial and first level and needs more development, even though it is already in a playable state.

You earn more points the faster you go, as shown in the in-game score multiplier. Killing enemies provides you with more score than simply going fast, so... well, you decide if you want to go fast or slow down to aim.

Try to beat my score, 63000 points ;)

Built on Unity3D.
